name: backend-support-colabo-space
description: Support for Backend part of Colabo.Space (puzzles, config, ...)

scripts.prepare: colabo puzzles-offer; colabo puzzles-install; colabo puzzles-build
scripts.clean_full: rm -r node_modules/; rm -r dev_puzzles/*/*/node_modules; rm -r dev_puzzles/*/*/dist; rm -r dist/
